author: psmith
msg: Added 'useCurrentThread' property to this receiver.  This is the same as the other Log-file based receiver.
Chainsaw requires a background thread to process events, but other uses of these receivers may wish to
wait for all logs to be imported before moving on to another stage.
This purely makes this class consistent with the other receiver.

author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-3420 create the remote-deployer files with their original filenames, so WAR deployments without aweb.xml or context root will have the correct base filename to use as the deployed context

author: esm
msg: Added getRegistrationHandle() ot Registration interface, and removed setter methods from the interface.  Updated the impl with interface changes.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Renamed packages to follow usual naming convention.
